title: Bloody Valentine
description: In Lucy Swing’s novella, Bloody Valentine, nothing is as it seems. Bailey has been having horrible nightmares. She is not sure what is going on but her dreams are too vivid for comfort. It’s like she is seeing things that haven’t happened yet. When girls start to go missing and she knows something is wrong and her nightmares are more than just that. She soon realizes that she trusted the wrong person and the one who she was afraid of was the one who wanted to protect her all along. But, will she be able to save all the girls before it’s too late? Will she be able to save herself?
author: Lucy Swing
